text: If I send a transfer via the wallet ui, does this create a transfer offer? Curious when I'll see the transaction show up on the UI, once the receiving party accepts? Any way to see that I have a pending sent transfer?

elements.text: If I send a transfer via the wallet ui, does this create a transfer offer? Curious when I'll see the transaction show up on the UI, once the receiving party accepts? Any way to see that I have a pending sent transfer?

text: <https://github.com/digital-asset/decentralized-canton-sync/issues/211|https://github.com/digital-asset/decentralized-canton-sync/issues/211>

attachments.fallback: #211 WALLET, UI: Display pending transactions (tansfer offiers)
attachments.text:
Wallet UI should provide a way to see initiated transactions (transfer offers) before they get accepted.

The related API endpoint:

 SV_AUTH='xxx'
WALLET_URL=<https://wallet.sv.global.canton.network.sv-nodeops.com>
curl -s -H "Authorization: $SV_AUTH" "$WALLET_URL/api/validator/v0/wallet/transfer-offers" | jq .
attachments.title: #211 WALLET, UI: Display pending transactions (tansfer offiers)

text:
Yes, a transfer via the wallet creates a transfer offer.

You’ll see the transaction after the recipient accepts it.

user_profile.real_name: Digital Asset Support for GSF Operations
